TopicTitle: 0.16, Novapunch pack, seaplane mod. Kodemunkey Aerospace Experimental Aircraft "Sled"

Articles.Content:
Step right up folks, meet the aircraft which humbled the mighty Jeb*, are you brave enough to try it?** It currently holds the world record for the fastest commute from New Kerbal City to our facilities, don't be scared, try it today!

*Jeb refuses to fly this thing, mainly because it doesn't fly too well, he was later found in a padded cell.

**Waivers must be signed and stamped in triplicate before boarding.

Craft file available, have fun. (I almost forgot, uses the crew pods mod)

Edited September 11, 2012 by kodemunkey
ill would epic if you opened the download link for all though pm me the link plz its gonna be EPIC
Added the .craft file to the main post.
